Other Orders¶

The Other Orders feature allows the admin to:

Upload¶

Upload other order files from a hospital or client EHR system that can be processed to provide valid and invalid procedures.

Contents¶

Contents view Valid,invalid and On Hold procedure data and send to the provider for review.

Valid Data¶

Valid Data displays all the procedures that valid with the National Library of Medicine.

Invalid Data¶

Invalid Data displays all the procedures that have not been validated with LOINC. There is also a search feature that lets you search for categories that would list the correct procedure for mapping.

On Hold¶

On Hold is an indicator that a procedure is being reviewed.

Review¶

Review list files that have been assigned for review and their status.

Export¶
